section.title: Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.Installations.Models.TryShowViewModelArgs Class Reference

listitem.para: TryShowViewModelArgs (Key< TextEditorViewModel > viewModelKey, Key< TextEditorGroup > groupKey, bool shouldSetFocusToEditor, IServiceProvider serviceProvider)
The identifier for which view model is to be used.
If this view model should be rendered as a tab within a group then provide this key. Otherwise pass in Key<T>.Empty.
